\begin{tabular}{lcr}
    \hline
    L & C & R
    \\\hline
    a & b & c
    \\\hline
    1 & 2 & 3
    \\\hline
\end{tabular}

\begin{tabular}{lrc}
    \hline
    A & B & C
    \\\hline
    x & 42 & y
    \\\hline
\end{tabular}

\begin{tabular}{ll}
    \hline
    item & cell
    \\\hline
    ampersand & A \& B
    \\\hline
    percent & 100\%
    \\\hline
    dollar & \$100
    \\\hline
    hash & \#1
    \\\hline
    underscore & a\_b
    \\\hline
    braces & \{x\}
    \\\hline
    tilde & \textasciitilde{}user
    \\\hline
    caret & x\textasciicircum{}2
    \\\hline
    backslash & C:\textbackslash{}path\textbackslash{}file
    \\\hline
\end{tabular}

\begin{tabular}{lll}
    \hline
    & h2 & h3
    \\\hline
    v1 & v2 & v3
    \\\hline
\end{tabular}

\begin{tabular}{lll}
    \hline
    a & b & c
    \\\hline
    1 &  & 3
    \\\hline
    & 2 &
    \\\hline
\end{tabular}

\begin{tabular}{lll}
    \hline
    a & b & c
    \\\hline
    1 & 2 &
    \\\hline
    3 & 4 & 5
    \\\hline
\end{tabular}

\begin{quotation}
    \begin{tabular}{ll}
        \hline
        a & b
        \\\hline
        1 & 2
        \\\hline
    \end{tabular}
\end{quotation}

\begin{itemize}
    \item before

        \begin{tabular}{ll}
            \hline
            a & b
            \\\hline
            1 & 2
            \\\hline
        \end{tabular}

    \item after
\end{itemize}

\begin{lstlisting}
| a | b |
| --- | --- |
| 1 | 2 |
\end{lstlisting}

| a | b |

| 1 | 2 |
